blogs.title: Billboard
blogs.excerpt: Best known for the Hot 100 and Billboard 200, which list the most popular songs and albums each week in the industry. Offers industry news, events, podcasts, and music streaming.

blogs.title: Business Insider
blogs.excerpt: High-end business journalism keeping readers up-to-date on economic news as well as interviews with top entrepreneurs. Thereâ€™s also educated predictions, trend analyses, and tips.

blogs.title: TMZ
blogs.excerpt: Podcasts, interviews, videos, and photo galleries covering the latest entertainment news in Australia and around the world. Articles primarily cover celebrity lifestyle, focusing on health, beauty, fashion, as well as travel.

blogs.title: Entrepreneur
blogs.excerpt: ind business news, webinars and events, book recommendations, and interviews with successful entrepreneurs. The site is updated daily and even has a magazine for longer-form pieces

blogs.title: Yahoo! Sports
blogs.excerpt: Covers all the top sports as well as fantasy leagues. In addition to sports coverage, opinion pieces and predictions over football, hockey, and soccer and other sports can be found.

blogdetails.title: Rolling Stone
blogdetails.excerpt: Features news and coverage across music, film, television, and politics, reviewing albums, songs, and celebrities. Interactive source for historical rankings and magazine content.
blogdetails.author: https://www.rollingstone.com/music/

blogdetails.title: Harvard Business Review
blogdetails.excerpt: Get practical advice on issues befalling business owners, such as how to overcome present challenges and keep a future-oriented viewpoint. Articles are written by experts in the field of business.
blogdetails.author: https://hbr.org/
